personal.name: Divanshu Sharma
personal.title: Full-stack Python Developer Machine Learning Engineer & AI Engineer
personal.bio:
Hey ðŸ‘‹
I'm Divanshu with expertise in AI/ML, LLMs, and Web Development. At WorldQuant BRAIN, I've built ensemble Alpha models and RAG systems using PubMedBERT and BioMistral-7B. I enjoy working with Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, React, and Django, contributing to open source and creating scalable applications. I'm certified in Deep Learning, TensorFlow, and Front-End Development, and proud to have earned GOLD recognition in the WorldQuant Alphathon.

completed1.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

achievements: Certified in Deep Learning by Coursera

experience.description: Developed high-Sharpe ratio quantitative Alpha models using advanced statistical techniques and market data analysis.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio website showcases my skills, projects, and achievements. Built with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, it features an AI chatbot powered by Google Gemini API for interactive Q&A. The site is optimized for performance and SEO, with a focus on user experience.

projects.title: BioMed-Retrieval
projects.description: A domain-specific Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system for biomedical Q&A using LLMs. Integrated PubMedBERT, BioMistral-7B, and Qdrant for hybrid semantic and keyword search. Fine-tuned responses using SFT-style prompt-response pairs to improve relevance by 30%.

projects.title: ProblemPioneer (ML4SCI Task Solutions)
projects.description: Implemented machine learning solutions for particle physics tasks from ML4SCI, including Electron/Photon classification using ResNet-15-like architecture, Quark-Gluon classification with VGG-inspired and CNN models, and particle momentum estimation using Graph Neural Networks (GCN and GAT).

projects.title: Next Word Prediction
projects.description: Trained a multi-layer LSTM network on a large text corpus of 580K+ sentences to predict the next word. Achieved 92% token-level accuracy and significantly reduced perplexity.

projects.title: Processing Foundation | p5.js Web Editor
projects.description: Contributed to the p5.js Web Editor open-source project by implementing a time-saving keyboard shortcut for file creation and fixing numerous UI/UX responsiveness issues. Enhanced cross-platform performance and mobile responsiveness through CSS and JavaScript improvements.

projects.title: React-Budgie
projects.description: A budget management application built using React. Features include budget overview and expense tracking, with data persistence using LocalStorage and a responsive UI for all devices.

projects.title: ReactFlix
projects.description: A movie listing application that allows users to browse and search for movies, view details, and add favorites. Built with React and React Router for seamless navigation, with a responsive UI.

internship.workStyle: Fast learner, team player, problem solver
internship.goals: Looking to join an innovative team developing AI-powered solutions, where I can contribute to impactful projects and continue growing my expertise in enterprise-level development.

funFacts: Contributed to open-source projects like the p5.js Web Editor, Vulnerable Code, PyNN, and more
Love solving complex problems with simple solutions
personality.workingStyle: I thrive in fast-paced environments, adapt quickly, and stay focused on delivering results
personality.motivation: Creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems and add value
